name: MOF
description:
“Want to know the meaning of life? Want to live… a real life?”

The World Shall Change When You Click Yes.

In God’s dimension, you have to keep getting stronger, keep evolving to survive the never-ending horrors.

This is a Survival Horror First person Shooting Looting Game

Player get superpower like Double Jump ——DASH——WallRun ——WallClimb——Slide

Player Can gather weapon armor fight against foes .Kill foes gain Loop points ,use this points to learn Active skills and Passive skills.

To challenge endless quests and adventures.
